short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create flash cards to learn a language and different topics in your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Anki Flash Cards + GPT is an innovative browser extension designed to create flashcards on the fly while browsing web pages. Simply highlight the text, click on the extension icon, and your flashcards are ready to use! This is an excellent tool for students and curious individuals who want to simplify the process of learning foreign languages or deepen their knowledge in various topics such as medicine or history.
